questDescription->We have intercepted a broadcast at a recently raided underground silo: Operation: Deadlife is now underway. Enough resource silos have been breached, and the plan has been set in motion. The broadcast confirms that [General_nameFull] has The Platinum Chip, and has initiated final preparations to use it at an ancient ICBM launch site.

Refueling of the devastating missiles is in progress. These warheads are armed with deadlife dust payloads and if launched, they will detonate high in orbit, spreading a near-permanent death pall across the planet. It is likely that endless hordes of shamblers will then scour the world, consuming or destroying all remaining civilization.

We have traced the origin of the signal to the ICBM launch facility. We must travel there and stop [General_nameFull] before the launch sequence can be completed. The site is expected to be heavily defended, not only swarming with shamblers, but also protected by restored automated defenses.

[General_nameFull] will activate numerous defensive systems from the facility’s control room: opening sealed death pits, releasing shambler animals from containment kennels, flooding the complex with rotstink gas, and awakening elite deadlife officers from cryogenic caskets.

Only by reaching and destroying the launch terminal can we prevent the missiles from firing. Failure to stop the launch in time, or ignoring this threat entirely, will doom the planet to a global shambler apocalypse.

This is our only chance to end Operation: Deadlife once and for all.

questDescription(asker_factionLeader==True)->[asker_nameDef], [asker_faction_leaderTitle] of [asker_faction_name], has informed us of the location of a sealed entrance to one of the [ancientSilos] left behind during Operation: Deadlife, a planet-spanning initiative launched by a [longDeadGovernment] in preparation for global catastrophe.

These silos were designed to remain sealed for generations, [intention]. Inside, it's believed they contain [containedReward]. The deeper chambers are rumored to hold equipment and supplies capable of restarting civilization itself.

[threat]. [importantLight]. Without the light, you’ll be navigating blind and vulnerable to attack.

[commandMap]. Studying these might reveal the locations of other silos, and more importantly, bring us closer to discovering the Command Headquarters, the nerve center of Operation: Deadlife, where the truth behind this apocalyptic plan may still lie buried.

It is believed that the person last carrying The Platinum Chip was last seen at this location.
